comments.body:
Since you only want Python >=3.7, since this is not noarch, need to specify that by skipping the 3.6 builds:
```suggestion
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [py36]
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@
build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [py36]
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
